target.name: initDataDirectory
target.description: Removes and re-creates a blank data directory in orgs/${orgname}

target.name: updateDataFiles
target.description: Refreshes the data files found in datascripts/datafiles from a specified org's data directory. This expects the exportData target to have been run first to generate output CSV data load files. Invoke with -Dorg=[org name, ex. asdevqa] to specify the org to copy files from.

sfExport.soql: Select Id, Name, NameNorm FROM SlaProcess
